00005 #include <fstream>
00006 
00007 #include "NonmemTranslator.h"
00008 #include "SpkCompilerException.h"
00009 
00010 #include <xercesc/dom/DOMDocument.hpp>
00011 #include <xercesc/dom/DOM.hpp>
00012 #include <xercesc/util/XMLString.hpp>
00013 
00014 using namespace std;
00015 using namespace xercesc;
00016 //=============================================================================
00017 //
00018 // Create a Makefile for either an SPK Optimization request or
00019 // a Monte Carlo integration request.
00020 //
00021 // Pre-condtions   - myIsMonte is set to true if the post-integration is
00022 //                   going to be performed.  False otherwise.
00023 // 
00024 //                 - The current working directory is writable.
00025 //
00026 // Post-conditions - A file, Makefile.SPK, is saved in the current 
00027 //                   working directory.  The make file defines targets
00028 //                   that are either to build an optimization/simulation driver
00029 //                   or a post-integration driver.
00030 //
00031 //=============================================================================
00032 void NonmemTranslator::generateMakefile() const
00033 {
00034   ofstream oMakefile( fMakefile );
00035   if( !oMakefile.good() )
00036     {
00037       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00038       snprintf( mess, 
00039         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00040         "Failed to create %s file.", fMakefile ); 
00041       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00042       throw e;
00043     }
00044 
00045   oMakefile << "PROD_DIR  = spkprod" << endl;
00046   oMakefile << "TEST_DIR  = spktest" << endl;
00047   oMakefile << endl;                                   
00048 
00049   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to build a production version." << endl;
00050   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_PROD = -O3 -Dspk_release -DNDEBUG " << endl;
00051   oMakefile << endl;
00052 
00053   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to build a test version." << endl;
00054   oMakefile << "# These are the same as the production flags because the" << endl;
00055   oMakefile << "# test system will be deployed into the production system." << endl;
00056   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS = " << endl;
00057   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_TEST = $(CXX_FLAGS_PROD) " << endl;
00058   oMakefile << endl;
00059 
00060   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to build a debug version." << endl;
00061   oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG = -g " << endl;
00062   oMakefile << endl;
00063 
00064   oMakefile << "# C++ compiler flags to turn on profiling" << endl;
00065   oMakefile << "# CXX_FLAGS += -pg -Dspk_profiling" << endl;
00066   oMakefile << endl;
00067 
00068   if( myModelSpec == ADVAN6 )
00069   {
00070     oMakefile << "# Define a macro \"ODEPRED\" when the job uses PRED." << endl;
00071     oMakefile << "CXX_FLAGS += -DODEPRED"; // Define "ODEPRED" macro
00072   }
00073   oMakefile << endl;                                        
00074 
00075   oMakefile << "LIBS      = -lspkpred -lspk -lQN01Box ";
00076   oMakefile << (myIsMonte? " -lgsl" : "" ) << " -llapack -llapack_atlas -lcblas -latlas -lpthread -lm -lxerces-c" << endl;
00077   oMakefile << endl;
00078 
00079   oMakefile << "COMMON_INCLUDE = \\" << endl;
00080   if( myModelSpec == PRED )
00081      oMakefile << "\tPred.h \\" << endl;
00082   else if( myModelSpec == ADVAN6 )
00083      oMakefile << "\tOdePred.h \\" << endl;
00084   oMakefile << "\tDataSet.h \\" << endl;
00085   oMakefile << "\tIndData.h \\" << endl;
00086   oMakefile << "\tNonmemPars.h \\" << endl;
00087   oMakefile << endl;                                   
00088 
00089   if( !myIsMonte )
00090     {
00091       oMakefile << "prod : fitDriver.cpp $(COMMON_INCLUDE)" << endl;
00092       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_PROD) $(CXX_FLAGS) fitDriver.cpp -o driver ";
00093       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00094       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00095       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00096       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR)/CppAD ";
00097       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00098       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00099       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00100       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00101       oMakefile << endl;
00102       
00103       oMakefile << "test : fitDriver.cpp $(COMMON_INCLUDE)" << endl;
00104       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_TEST) $(CXX_FLAGS) fitDriver.cpp -o driver ";
00105       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00106       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00107       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00108       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR)/CppAD ";
00109       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00110       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00111       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00112       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00113       oMakefile << endl;
00114 
00115       oMakefile << "debug : fitDriver.cpp $(COMMON_INCLUDE)" << endl;
00116       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG) $(CXX_FLAGS) fitDriver.cpp -o driver ";
00117       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00118       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00119       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00120       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR)/CppAD ";
00121       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00122       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00123       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00124       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00125       oMakefile << endl;
00126 
00127       oMakefile << "clean : " << endl;
00128       oMakefile << "\trm -f $(COMMON_INCLUDE) \\" << endl;
00129       oMakefile << "\tspkDriver.cpp \\" << endl;
00130       oMakefile << "\tdriver \\" << endl;
00131       oMakefile << "\tsoftware_error \\" << endl;
00132       oMakefile << "\tresult.xml \\" << endl;
00133       oMakefile << "\tpredEqn.cpp \\" << endl;
00134       oMakefile << "\tspk_error.tmp \\" << endl;
00135       oMakefile << "*.o" << endl;    
00136     }
00137   else
00138     {
00139       oMakefile << "MONTE_CPP = \\" << endl;
00140       oMakefile << "\tmonteDriver.cpp \\" << endl; 
00141       oMakefile << "\tAdaptIntegral.cpp \\" << endl;
00142       oMakefile << "\tGridIntegral.cpp \\" << endl;
00143       oMakefile << "\tMontePopObj.cpp \\" << endl;
00144       oMakefile << "\tMapBay.cpp \\" << endl;
00145       oMakefile << "\tMapMonte.cpp \\" << endl;
00146       oMakefile << "\tGsl2SpkError.cpp" << endl;
00147       oMakefile << endl;
00148       oMakefile << "MONTE_SRC = $(MONTE_CPP) " << endl;
00149     
00150 
00151       oMakefile << "MONTE_INCLUDE = \\" << endl;
00152       oMakefile << "\tAdaptIntegral.h \\" << endl;
00153       oMakefile << "\tGridIntegral.h \\" << endl;
00154       oMakefile << "\tMontePopObj.h \\" << endl;
00155       oMakefile << "\tMapBay.h \\" << endl;
00156       oMakefile << "\tMapMonte.h \\" << endl;
00157       oMakefile << "\tGsl2SpkError.h" << endl;
00158       oMakefile << endl;
00159 
00160       oMakefile << "prod : adapt.o pow_ii.o "           << endl;
00161       oMakefile << "\tmake -f Makefile.SPK monte_clean" << endl;
00162       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(PROD_DIR)/ml/* ." << endl;
00163       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_PROD) $(CXX_FLAGS) $(MONTE_CPP) adapt.o pow_ii.o -o monteDriver ";
00164       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00165       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00166       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00167       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00168       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(PROD_DIR)/CppAD ";
00169       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(PROD_DIR) ";
00170       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00171       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00172       oMakefile << endl;
00173       
00174       oMakefile << "test : adapt.o pow_ii.o "           << endl;
00175       oMakefile << "\tmake -f Makefile.SPK monte_clean" << endl;
00176       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(TEST_DIR)/ml/* . " << endl;
00177       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_TEST) $(CXX_FLAGS) $(MONTE_CPP) adapt.o pow_ii.o -o monteDriver ";
00178       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00179       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00180       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00181       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00182       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR)/CppAD ";
00183       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00184       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00185       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00186       oMakefile << endl;
00187 
00188       oMakefile << "debug : adapt.o pow_ii.o "           << endl;
00189       oMakefile << "\tmake -f Makefile.SPK monte_clean" << endl;
00190       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(TEST_DIR)/ml/* . " << endl;
00191       oMakefile << "\tg++ $(CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG) $(CXX_FLAGS) $(MONTE_CPP) adapt.o pow_ii.o -o monteDriver ";
00192       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib ";
00193       oMakefile << "-L/usr/lib/atlas ";
00194       oMakefile << "-L/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00195       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00196       oMakefile << "-I/usr/local/include/$(TEST_DIR)/CppAD ";
00197       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib/$(TEST_DIR) ";
00198       oMakefile << "-Wl,--rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib ";
00199       oMakefile << "$(LIBS)" << endl;
00200       oMakefile << endl;
00201 
00202       oMakefile << "adapt.o : "                       << endl;
00203       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(TEST_DIR)/ml/adapt.c ." << endl;
00204       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(TEST_DIR)/ml/f2c.h   ." << endl;
00205       oMakefile << "\tgcc $(CXX_FLAGS) -c adapt.c"   << endl;
00206       oMakefile << endl;
00207 
00208       oMakefile << "pow_ii.o : "                       << endl;
00209       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(TEST_DIR)/ml/pow_ii.c ." << endl;
00210       oMakefile << "\tcp /usr/local/src/$(TEST_DIR)/ml/f2c.h   ." << endl;
00211       oMakefile << "\tgcc $(CXX_FLAGS) -c pow_ii.c"   << endl;
00212       oMakefile << endl;
00213   
00214       oMakefile << "monte_clean : " << endl;
00215       oMakefile << "\trm -f $(MONTE_SRC) $(MONTE_INCLUDE)" << endl;
00216       oMakefile << endl;
00217 
00218       oMakefile << "clean : " << endl;
00219       oMakefile << "\trm -f $(COMMON_INCLUDE) \\" << endl;
00220       oMakefile << "\t$(MONTE_SRC) \\" << endl;
00221       oMakefile << "\t$(MONTE_INCLUDE) \\" << endl;
00222       oMakefile << "\tdriver \\" << endl;
00223       oMakefile << "\tsoftware_error \\" << endl;
00224       oMakefile << "\tresult.xml \\" << endl;
00225       oMakefile << "\tpredEqn.cpp \\" << endl;
00226       oMakefile << "\tspk_error.tmp \\" << endl;
00227       oMakefile << "\t*.o" << endl;
00228     }
00229   oMakefile.close();
00230 
00231   return;
00232 }
